page.title: 13Recreation on Beeley Moor
page.content: Within the home environment many interests and hobbies are pursued. Most of the dwellings have a well kept flower garden. {FAMILY PETS:-}dogs, cats, rabbits and goats. Four of the families keep horses for riding. {ACTIVITIES AT HOME:-}embroidery is done and knitting and sewing for family needs. Reading is a popular pastime and the mobile library is used. Most of the families own a television set, radio and stereogram. {ACTIVITIES OUTSIDE THE HOME:-}a keen interest is shown in local history by some of the inhabitants who belong to a local history society. Other activities followed are village choir and brass band playing. Some are Rotarians. One family keep bees and is a member of a bee keeping club. Bowls is a popular hobby of the inhabitants.
